ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T02:43:56 [Issue ID 4000-1132990] urn:comicvine:4000-1132990 urn:grandcomicsdatabase:issue/1132990 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 17:39:51. [Issue ID 1132990]
ComicInfo.Summary: Fearing to be on the losing end of a coming war, Pandora funds a cloning experiment on a remote tropical island. After several failed clones, Anna Martelli has given the scientists a tissue sample of Pandora herself. The resulting clone is called Shimmer. Suddenly, the base is overrun by H&K agents. Anna quickly programs Shimmer to protect her. Shimmer kills most H&K agents before Anna is knocked out during the fight. When she regains consciousness, Shimmer is gone.
ComicInfo.Title: One-Shot
